activities:
6 Sense Insights collects personal information from visitors to its
Website (which could include visitors from the EU/EEA) that fill out the 6
Sense Insights contact form. The Personal Information could include, for
example, first and last name, address, telephone number, email address,
job position and company name. The personal information collected by 6
Sense Insights could be used for the following types of activities:
To initiate contact with its customers or potential customers requesting
quotes or information regarding 6 Sense Insights services and in
connection with delivering services to such customers;
To send customers newsletters, updates, service –related surveys and other
information regarding 6 Sense Insights products and services to better
inform such customers regarding 6 Sense Insights products and services;
To update 6 Sense Insights records regarding its customers.
6 Sense Insights might also receive Personal Information from customers
and third-party data providers located in the EU/EEA for processing by 6
Sense Insights as part of the 6Sense service.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Information received from customers, prospective customers and suppliers.
